Holidays (Amendment) Act, No. 39 of 1056 AN Act To AMEND THE Houmays ORDINANCE. (Glayin 158 (Date of Assent: September 6, 1936.) ae 00. BE it enacted by the Queen's Most Excellent : Majesty, by and with the advice and consent of the ‘Senate and the House of Representatives of Ceylon in this present Parkiament assembled, and by the ‘authority of the same, as follows: — 4. This Act may be cited as the Holidays (Amend. Sot tite. ment) Act, No. 39 of 1956. 2. The First Schedule to the Holidays Ordinance, Amspimen ot as amended by Act, No. 40 of 1951, is hereby amended Shei to as follows: — Chapter 188, (2) by the substitution, for the words and figure “ Jamuary 1 and the day following.” of the word and figure “January 1.7; (2) by the substitution, for the words “ The Sinhalese and Tamil New Year's Day and the four days following.’*, of the words “The Sinhalese and Tamil New Year's Day and the three days following.”’; (8) by the substitution, for the word and fgure . “July 1”, of the word and figures “June 807; and (&) by the addition, at the end of that Schedule, of the following: — “The day following Christmas Day.
